alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:25PM EST until January 19 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 4 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In New York, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Tompkins, Madison, Cortland, Chenango and Broome counties. In Pennsylvania, Northern Wayne county. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 4 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation types will be highly variable across the area over time and depending on elevation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be found at 511ny.org or 511pa.com, or dial 5-1-1.
